message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm asking for $15,000 for it.  What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $15,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Would you be willing to consider this price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $9,000 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to be flexible. How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?
I appreciate your flexibility, but $13,000 is still a bit too high for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $10,500. Would you be willing to consider this price?
